page.title: 18Leisure
page.content: The only organised leisure activity in the area is{Hang Gliding.}The training centre has been operating for 3yrs,and is now one of the more successful schools in the country.The location at {Warren Hill}is ideally suited,close to the sea with sea breezes to help people to fly.Approx 200-300 students are taught each year. During the Summer mouths residents are admitted to{Atherfield Holiday Camp} where they can enjoy the facilities offered there.The most popular local beaches are{Shepherd's Chine,Whale {Chine and Atherfield}where not only {swimming but also windsurfing and {fishing}are enjoyed.People visited the Leisure Centres at Newport & Ryde and pubs just outside our area.There are no children's clubs but 2 boys did belong to{Cubs}at Chale.The local{ {Agricultural Shows}were well supported
